name: parallels-desktop
description: Manage Parallels Desktop virtual machines, their snapshots and containers

commands.name: state
commands.description: change the state of a VM

parallels-desktop.extension.path.description: Path for the Parallels Desktop extension

parallels-desktop.extension.download.pat.description: Download cache folder for the VMs ISO's

parallels-desktop.hashicorp.vagrant.boxe.description: Vagrant box files folder for new VMs

parallels-desktop.hashicorp.vagrant.para.description: Is Parallels plugin installed for Vagrant

parallels-desktop.extension.refresh.auto.description: Set Auto Refresh for Parallels Desktop Tree View

parallels-desktop.tree.show-hidden-items.description: Shows Hidden items in the tree

parallels-desktop.extension.show-flat-sn.description: Show snapshots as a flat list

parallels-desktop.extension.start-machin.description: Start Machines in headless mode by default

viewsWelcome.contents:
Welcome to Parallels Desktop
 Please add a virtual machine to start using the extension.
[Create Virtual Machine](command:parallels-desktop.tree-view.add-vm)

Welcome to Parallels Desktop
 To have access to this functionality you need a Pro or Business license.
[Buy Pro License](command:parallels-desktop.common.buy-pro-license)
[Buy Business License](command:parallels-desktop.common.buy-business-license)

Welcome to Parallels Desktop Catalog
To learn more about how to get started and to see an example please go to the [documentation page](https://parallels.github.io/prl-devops-service/examples/remote-catalog/)
To add your first Catalog Provider press this button
[Add Catalog Provider](command:parallels-desktop.devops-service.add-catalog-provider)

Welcome to Parallels Desktop Remote Hosts
To learn more about how to get started please go to our [documentation page](https://parallels.github.io/prl-devops-service/examples/remote-catalog/)
To add your first Remote Host or Orchestrator press this button
[Add Remote Host Provider](command:parallels-desktop.devops-service.add-remote-host-provider)

Welcome to Vagrant Boxes Management
 Please add a Vagrant box to start using the extension.

Welcome to Vagrant Boxes Management
You don't seem to have Vagrant from Hashicorp installed in your system, to know more aboutHashicorp Vagrant please visit [Hashicorp Vagrant](https://www.vagrantup.com/)
To install Hashicorp Vagrant press this button
[Install Vagrant](command:parallels-desktop.vagrant.install)

Welcome to Parallels Desktop
 Please use the follow links to get help
[Discord Server](https://discord.gg/etqdafGvjK)
[Report a Bug](https://github.com/Parallels/parallels-vscode-extension/issues/new?assignees=&labels=bug&projects=&template=bug_report.md&title=)
[Request a Feature](https://github.com/Parallels/parallels-vscode-extension/issues/new?assignees=&labels=enhancement&projects=&template=feature_request.md&title=)
